author: probonopd
body:
Closes #2024

[AppImage](http://appimage.org/) is a packaging format for Linux that lets users download one single file, set the executable bit and run the application (here: PowerShell). Unlike other solutions, no special runtime infrastructure must be installed on the target system(s).

This pull request, when merged, will package PowerShell as an AppImage and upload it.
